publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2861 Jamie Hepburn: On the Money (Leis an Airgead)—That the Parliament congratulates the authors of On the Money, Theresa Breslin, Jonathan Meres, Nicola Morgan and Alison Prince, on the successful translation of their book from English into Gaelic; recognises the importance of this book, which teaches children the importance of being financially aware; further recognises the involvement of Standard Life, the Scottish Book Trust and Learning and Teaching Scotland in the project, and congratulates Condorrat Primary School in Cumbernauld on its successful hosting of the launch of the Gaelic translation of On the Money in Scotland.

S3M-2861 On the Money (Leis an Airgead) (lodged on 11 November 2008) Robin Harper*, Keith Brown*, Ken Macintosh*, Bill Wilson*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Bashir Ahmad*, Kenneth Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Alex Neil*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-2861 On the Money (Leis an Airgead) (lodged on 11 November 2008) Gil Paterson*

S3M-2861 Jamie Hepburn: On the Money (Leis an Airgead)—That the Parliament congratulates the authors of On the Money, Theresa Breslin, Jonathan Meres, Nicola Morgan and Alison Prince, on the successful translation of their book from English into Gaelic; recognises the importance of this book, which teaches children the importance of being financially aware; further recognises the involvement of Standard Life, the Scottish Book Trust and Learning and Teaching Scotland in the project, and congratulates Condorrat Primary School in Cumbernauld on its successful hosting of the launch of the Gaelic translation of On the Money in Scotland. Supported by: Robin Harper, Keith Brown, Ken Macintosh, Bill Wilson, Rob Gibson, Bob Doris, Bashir Ahmad, Kenneth Gibson, Alasdair Allan, Bill Kidd, Alex Neil, Christina McKelvie, Gil Paterson
S3M-2861 On the Money (Leis an Airgead) (lodged on 11 November 2008) Dave Thompson*
